select HUIYUAN_UNITCOMINFO.*, HUIYUAN_ZFCG_GONGYINGINFO.AUDITSTATUS, HUIYUAN_ZFCG_GONGYINGINFO.STATUSCODE from HUIYUAN_UNITCOMINFO,HUIYUAN_ZFCG_GONGYINGINFO where HUIYUAN_ZFCG_GONGYINGINFO.DANWEIGUID=HUIYUAN_UNITCOMINFO.DANWEIGUID

1=1

order by HUIYUAN_UNITCOMINFO.DANWEINAME desc
sqlMap.insert: insert into HUIYUAN_UNITCOMINFO (DANWEIGUID, DANWEINAME, AREACODE, AREANAME, UNITORGNUM, COMPANYTYPE, CHENLITIME, FAREN, FARENZHIWU, FARENZHICHENG, WEBADDRESS, FARENTEL, LICENCENUM, ZHUCEZIBEN, ZHUCETYPE, ZHUCEADDRESS, JINYINGFANWEI, YINGYEQIXIANFROM, YINGYEQIXIANTO, COMPANYDES, BUILDDATE, MAINITEM, MIANPRODUCT, ASSISTANTITEM, ASSISTANTPRODUCT, GUOSHUINO, DISHUINO, FARENLICENCENUM, ENGLISHNAME, UNITJIANCHENG, DENGJIJIGUAN, QIYESHEBAOHAO, NIANJIANJIEGUO, DANWEITYPE) values (#danweiguid:VARCHAR#, #danweiname:VARCHAR#, #areacode:VARCHAR#, #areaname:VARCHAR#, #unitorgnum:VARCHAR#, #companytype:VARCHAR#, #chenlitime:DATE#, #faren:VARCHAR#, #farenzhiwu:VARCHAR#, #farenzhicheng:VARCHAR#, #webaddress:VARCHAR#, #farentel:VARCHAR#, #licencenum:VARCHAR#, #zhuceziben:DECIMAL#, #zhucetype:VARCHAR#, #zhuceaddress:VARCHAR#, #jinyingfanwei:VARCHAR#, #yingyeqixianfrom:DATE#, #yingyeqixianto:DATE#, #companydes,handler=org.springframework.orm.ibatis.support.ClobStringTypeHandler#, #builddate:DATE#, #mainitem:VARCHAR#, #mianproduct:VARCHAR#, #assistantitem:VARCHAR#, #assistantproduct:VARCHAR#, #guoshuino:VARCHAR#, #dishuino:VARCHAR#, #farenlicencenum:VARCHAR#, #englishname:VARCHAR#, #unitjiancheng:VARCHAR#, #dengjijiguan:VARCHAR#, #qiyeshebaohao:VARCHAR#, #nianjianjieguo:VARCHAR#, #danweitype:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update HUIYUAN_UNITCOMINFO set DANWEINAME = #danweiname:VARCHAR#, AREACODE = #areacode:VARCHAR#, AREANAME = #areaname:VARCHAR#, UNITORGNUM = #unitorgnum:VARCHAR#, COMPANYTYPE = #companytype:VARCHAR#, CHENLITIME = #chenlitime:DATE#, FAREN = #faren:VARCHAR#, FARENZHIWU = #farenzhiwu:VARCHAR#, FARENZHICHENG = #farenzhicheng:VARCHAR#, WEBADDRESS = #webaddress:VARCHAR#, FARENTEL = #farentel:VARCHAR#, LICENCENUM = #licencenum:VARCHAR#, ZHUCEZIBEN = #zhuceziben:DECIMAL#, ZHUCETYPE = #zhucetype:VARCHAR#, ZHUCEADDRESS = #zhuceaddress:VARCHAR#, JINYINGFANWEI = #jinyingfanwei:VARCHAR#, YINGYEQIXIANFROM = #yingyeqixianfrom:DATE#, YINGYEQIXIANTO = #yingyeqixianto:DATE#, COMPANYDES = #companydes:VARCHAR#, BUILDDATE = #builddate:DATE#, MAINITEM = #mainitem:VARCHAR#, MIANPRODUCT = #mianproduct:VARCHAR#, ASSISTANTITEM = #assistantitem:VARCHAR#, ASSISTANTPRODUCT = #assistantproduct:VARCHAR#, GUOSHUINO = #guoshuino:VARCHAR#, DISHUINO = #dishuino:VARCHAR#, FARENLICENCENUM = #farenlicencenum:VARCHAR#, ENGLISHNAME = #englishname:VARCHAR#, UNITJIANCHENG = #unitjiancheng:VARCHAR#, DENGJIJIGUAN = #dengjijiguan:VARCHAR#, QIYESHEBAOHAO = #qiyeshebaohao:VARCHAR#, NIANJIANJIEGUO = #nianjianjieguo:VARCHAR#, DANWEITYPE = #danweitype:VARCHAR# where DANWEIGUID = #danweiguid:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
select HUIYUAN_UNITCOMINFO.*, HUIYUAN_ZFCG_GONGYINGINFO.AUDITSTATUS, HUIYUAN_ZFCG_GONGYINGINFO.STATUSCODE from HUIYUAN_UNITCOMINFO,HUIYUAN_ZFCG_GONGYINGINFO where HUIYUAN_ZFCG_GONGYINGINFO.DANWEIGUID=HUIYUAN_UNITCOMINFO.DANWEIGUID
( HUIYUAN_UNITCOMINFO.DANWEINAME=#zcText1# or HUIYUAN_UNITCOMINFO.UNITORGNUM=#zcText2# )
